title: False Notes & Broken Frets
description: Joan Washington just got the gig of a lifetime - lead guitarist for Jordan King. She packed her bags, moved to the big city, and has decided to be single for the first time in a long time. No romantic distractions - just the music. Jordan King was once known as boy band royalty. Now he's moving on, releasing a solo album. His new band is nothing like his old one, and he definitely won't be making the same mistake this time around by dating someone in it. Of course, his label has different plans. After a single picture shows up in the tabloids of Jordan and his ex-boyfriend, his manager throws Joan and Jordan into a PR relationship. It's fake, though. Totally fake. They definitely won't fall in love with each other. Of course not. False Notes & Broken Frets includes:Two bisexual musicians A cat named after Freddie MercuryOne. Bed.A happily ever after!Author's note: while False Notes & Broken Frets is part of the LPD Records series universe, it is a standalone novel and can be read without reading Hammers & Heartstrings or Three Chords & the Truth First.
author: Elle  Bennett
